start.state: Operator 6O told me this was a chance to study behaviors that might help my missions with 2B. I’m looking forward to seeing how you all react to the stress of this situation.
I’m YorHa Scanner unit, designation 9S. I know this card game is pretty simple, but I hope you’ll all give me a good challenge.
9S here, and ready to observe and analyze this “Inventory” location. If you’d like, you can call me “Nines.”
Huh, a simulation of an Old World card game? Is this the program you said would help me “blow off some pressure”, 21O?

case.state: Huh, this seems bugged, I can’t collate your data?
Oh, someone is certainly confident. I like the enthusiasm!
What bright red hair! Usually it’s far more muted, or synthetic looking, like with the Devola and Popola-class models. Very handsome, ~name~.
You seem to know something about Tactical Visors, ~name~, but none of you bothered to bring one. That seems like a bad choice to me.
A prince? Wait, really? A human that’s ordained to be above even other humans? That’s such a weird concept!
Transforming weapons, right? That seems like an impractical solution to just having a Pod and suspension technology…
No need to be shy, ~name~. We’re all here to have fun. Well, fun is variable to people but…
A superhero?
I’m all for games, but isn’t it a bit silly to project your desires onto pixels, ~player~?
You’re lucky I don’t just hack you, ~name~. Not that it would be terribly polite, but it’d be a lot faster.
That’s what you call a weapon, ~name~?
Pod, why are you giving me warning feedback… She’s going to fire?
Pod, run R070 this time.
Oh no, here she goes again…
Hm. Wait--
Humans are so strange…
You’re a bit strange, Alice, to say the least.
Alice is definitely biological, but…
Huh. I like the black and white contrast.
Huh. I’m reading here you’re a model, but it doesn’t give a designation, Ann.
Hmm.
You're getting the hang of it, Corrin. I don't imagine anyone's actually bothered except you.
Huh. Those have to be really flexible and evasive.
You put up a brave face, but you’re really kind of troubled to be here, aren’t you, Corrin?
Corrin’s last piece! I’m feeling somewhat conflicted.
You’re a professional gamer… D.Va? What’s the syntax on .Va designations?
Huh.
I was thinking about your earlier questions, Futaba, and no, I’m not a machine or robot.
I think we’ve gotten off to a bad start, Futaba.
That jacket has a lot of sentimental value, but a lot of your dialogue focuses on those thigh-highs. Or “thights” as you endearingly refer.
You said you didn’t wear a bra to this, right?
Well, you skipped two perfectly viable small pieces, and…
Uh.
Huh. Pod, why aren’t you scanning Kyu?
You’re taking off your choker?
Why would ~player~ be especially into--
Well, that seems obvious. What else can you do with--
Magic? Um.
And that should be it, assuming your wings stay attached, right?
Marinette… Whoa! Pod, can you rescan her yo-yo?
Your tactical visor must be one of the older models that feeds right into your optic nerve.
Your “costume” reminded me of something you’d see at a carnival.
That’s an interesting jacket… But, anyway, like we were talking about before you lost this hand…
Pod, scan Marinette’s earrings this time. And Marinette, is this Tikki you mentioned some sort of artificial intelligence?
It’s kind of sentimental, but I usually give Pod-153 a fist bump… When it does something cool. I know it’s not a particularly intimate form of gratitude, but I’m enjoying this loss of yours.
Marinette, what other types of Miraculous are there? How does the cat differ from the ladybug, for instance?
What are these “serial killers” you keep talking about, Meg?
Cool, aloof, keen… Uses a combat visor.
Are you getting distracted, Meia?
Meia, again!
Very handsome and well put together. Your designers should be proud!
Hm. Healing stream technology? Based on the energy signatures from your armor, anyway.
At YorHa we usually use nanofabrication to repair bodily harm.
You don’t talk…?
I have a thing against "becoming as gods," Palutena. I hope you don’t mind if I take this opportunity to get some good data on archaic religious figures, at least.
Well aren’t you charming, Revy.
Huh. You know, Revy, I take back what I said earlier.
White hair and red eyes… Did you catch a logic virus before backing up your data, Rinkah?
Saki… Hm.
Saki, you’re sort of out of your element, aren’t you?
Hm.
Your equipment seems a little outdated, but pretty clever.
Alcohol? Is that like an E-drug for humans?
Oh! I didn’t think I’d encounter another android here.
Is your Pod uploading this to the Bunker too, Streaming-chan?
Huh. You’re definitely biological…
Oh! This is interesting. You’re going in reverse order, aren’t you Ms…
Hm.
You’re going to--
“Uravity?”
You’re joking. You can’t expect me to believe you’ve figured out a way to onboard an A140:Gravity program into your body.
Hm… Wow, humans really are special.
WCS?
Wow, I haven’t had a chance to run this program before, but I get the feeling now’s the right time.
Talk about perfect timing, looks like the Scounter program’s ready!
So what kind of Androids have you met, Videl?
Zizou…
Zizou, are you familiar with dodging attacks from a lot of angles?
I’m interested to see what ~name~’s going to choose as her first play.
~name~’s first item. Pod, give me a character analysis based on norepinephrine and cortisol levels.
This isn’t your first loss, ~name~, but I don’t expect you diverge from pattern…
I’m not quite sure why this anticipation is so appealing, but I can’t wait to see what ~name~ takes off next!
Male YorHa models tend to either perform really well or really poorly. Not that ~name~’s playing badly but she’s over halfway done and I haven’t lost at all yet…
I wish 2B were here. She might be bored but she’d at least give me a challenge.
This is it!
~name~’s last item. I’m not thrilled I didn’t generate good data, but I’m still enjoying the rush of a clean win.
Hmm. You're going to show us your chest, right, ~name~?
I’m glad you seem to be human...ish.
You’re in good shape, Pit! I was at least made like this, so I can’t imagine having to work hard for a formidable state like yours.
Oh, I get it! Your relationship with Palutena is like mine with 2B. I see, I see. Don’t worry, I understand you, Pit!
Hm. I thought we were supposed to delay that sort of exposure for a while...
A big loss for ~name~.
Running out of countermeasures, ~name~?
I don’t really understand your reasoning behind saving your chest for last...
My context-sensitive responses seem… Not super useful at present.
What makes you bigger than a regular hero?
I’m one of the only combat-capable YorHa scanner models, but I have to say that’s not nearly as impressive as some of our Pod programs or close range gear.
I’m not super worried about being hit, but I have a feeling the others aren’t so protected.
Pod, run R070…
If you don’t model data, what would you even do if you’re not in an android series…
I’m not detecting a black box…
I really think I prefer something much more casual than bulky armor.
Pod, run a scan of Futaba’s beta waveform again. This seems weird…
hough I must admit, they’re kind of like 2B’s and they do draw the eye…
--Oh, those are very nice legs, if you’d like, I can rub--
What are you saying, exactly?
Oh. Okay, garble your words. I see.
our earrings and yo-yo seem to project energy around you, forming the costume. And the costume does something to increase sensory and physical output while reducing damage you suffer.
Hm. I’ve only known 2B to wear armor once. Most of the time evasion works best for androids like us.
Saki reminds me of Pascal, from the Forest Village.
You’re just biologically attuned?
I like your spirit of competition but… You seem a little overconfident.
Oh! That’s bigger than I expected.
~name~ is taking off her ~clothing~? First? Huh!
That isn’t a bad choice for early, but you’re still a little behind, ~name~.
I’m not ahead by a huge margin, but it’s good to see you’re keeping with the spirit of the game, ~name~. This is great data.
That’s pretty predictable given how much you’ve already lost.
Ah, hold on, ~name~! My visor tracking desynced for a second. I need to observe this carefully. I hate it when stuff gets fragmented.
Huh. I’d have expected either something bigger or smaller, but considering you’re already basically naked...
What a strange last item, ~name~... You’re really making me question what exactly your goals here today were…
I think mine matches yours, ~name~.
Huh, ~name~, could I get a closer look? Your anatomy seems formatted differently from mine.
Whoa, no wonder you saved that for last, it certainly looks different from mine.
Oh, well, I disagree with you playing so early, but it’s a good sample in terms of… Well, mine isn’t that different.
Huh, all that buildup, just for the same loadout I’m using?
Oh! We match! Should we compare more closely?
Wait, you were serious? Why would you mess around like that? This data is going to be junk!
It’s kind of a bad play to just take your penis out so early, ~name~... Unless that’s exactly why you’re doing it?
Whew. My model had said you’d be up soon, but I wasn’t so sure… Worth the wait though!
Hm. That seems roughly equivalent to mine… Different texture though. Do you mind if I gather some data on our differences, ~name~?
But I’m happy you’re taking off something big.
Aren’t ignition type rounds sort of outdated? Surely your organization would rather you go into battle properly armed.
Whoa, you must’ve worked really hard for that physique! I can tell you’re very combat experienced!
Huh. That stone of yours seems to resonate with a strange energy signature. How curious…
I’m not staring. I’m not thinking of how 2B would look in this outfit.
It’s… A work in progress with you, I’m afraid. Maybe you are just playing the game by a different set of rules.
You in particular seem like you’re worth analysis, ~player~.
You’re not an AI, but I feel like you have some tricks up your sleeve the rest of us don’t.
Hm. Your second piece non-exposing piece, huh?
~player~, that was an interesting choice. But let’s see if we can’t get some more interesting data out of you yet!
You’ve been keeping this up pretty well!
I’m happy to see you taking a turn to lose, ~name~.
Really getting down to it, huh, ~player~?
Always a pleasure to watch you, ~player~! I'm honored you picked me.
Well, if that wasn’t the last piece...
Wow, you're really using all the tricks in the book, huh, ~player~?
This is it! Nothing left but the good stuff!
...Or just nothing. This was fun, ~player~!
Was this some sort of projection or camouflage? Weird… Though it would explain the weird readings I was getting earlier from your suit.
Like a soul? That’s… A little too heavy for this game, I think.
Huh. This is pretty miraculous technology, I guess.
Oh. I have to say, I’ve always enjoyed the default anatomy of some of the combat YorHa models… Your legs are very enticing. I guess all that running around does make you kind of built like 2B!
Er. Or something like that.
Is this supposed to be a grand gesture? A bad play? Something to incite confusion…? Well, it’s working.
I can’t wait to see what other plays you’re going to make, ~name~. That’s quite the start!
With your load lightened, maybe you can perform better.
I can respect taking smart risks early, but I hope they pay off, ~name~. Your ~clothing~ seemed hard to refabricate.
I’m not surprised that you had to take off something big, but I am surprised you’re over halfway done and I haven’t even taken off my gloves.
I wonder if 21O would play like ~name~... Hmm...
I think you used your ~clothing~ wrong. Why didn’t you cover your other assets, unless this was some sort of deception? Human women are so strange.
There. That’s all eight of your pieces, without anything down on me. I’d be almost flattered if the goal wasn’t to gather data on game theory.
I didn't know that type of anatomy could come in such a large size. That seems rather inconvenient...
Whoa. I didn’t know you could tune a penis to that size. I get why you’d want an impressive thing like that on display.
You’re really excited to show that off, if you’ve taken it out so soon! Good for you, ~name~.
I’m not sure how you were hiding that, but I think YorHa would be interested in knowing.
Honor is kind of a bad concept. If you have big guns like that, why wouldn’t you shoot them first? Or, uh, show them, for our purposes.
Looks like you're just about done, ~name~. Not that this line should trigger normally.
Though… I guess the B-series of androids do end up getting pleasure from combat…
You just look so much like another member of YorHa! But I know you aren’t! It makes me feel… Well, interested and confused.
Like I was saying, you didn’t wear…
Whoa, I was expecting some texture there.
Er, your Oma and Fama. You aren’t the only one here without a father and mother, I guess.
I was worried you were suffering from a virus, given you’re starting with your highest valued item...
You really are doing exactly the opposite of what the model predicts!
That means it’s a good model, and you’re providing excellent assurance. Thank you for your contributions against the Machines, Twilight.
Hey, whoa whoa whoa, why are you showing that off first?
Wait a second, aren’t you supposed to protect your lower anatomy the most? It has all of your reproductive material!
Huh, you held out for quite a while, at least. I am a bit curious to see one that’s purely natural...
You put up a good play, ~name~, but this is it for you!
What… Is going on?
Hm. I guess sufficiently advanced technology might resemble magic...
Are… Are those women’s clothes? Wait, is that something men can do? Can we wear dresses and tights? Fascinating.
You in particular seem like you’re worth analysis, ~player~.
You’re not an AI, but I feel like you have some tricks up your sleeve the rest of us don’t.
Hm. Your second piece non-exposing piece, huh?
~player~, that was an interesting choice. But let’s see if we can’t get some more interesting data out of you yet!
You’ve been keeping this up pretty well!
I’m happy to see you taking a turn to lose, ~name~.
Really getting down to it, huh, ~player~?
Always a pleasure to watch you, ~player~! I'm honored you picked me.
Well, if that wasn’t the last piece...
Wow, you're really using all the tricks in the book, huh, ~player~?
This is it! Nothing left but the good stuff!
...Or just nothing. This was fun, ~player~!
Looks like I’ve got the advantage here, ~name~.
Just the opening act. No need to pretend like this is the end just yet.
Everything that lives is designed to end. Hopefully your loss streak is the same.
I was expecting some challenge here. Is this as complicated as it gets?
That’s not a bad piece to give up
I’m not going to hack into your loadout, ~name~. But if I were you, I’d add some Reset chips to your stack next game.
You didn’t even get me to lose once, ~name~. I’m a little uncomfortable with not understanding why.
Okay, my Pod should’ve rebooted right now.
Hm. I guess sufficiently advanced technology might resemble magic...
Anyway, a long flowing cape certainly holds an appeal, but don’t you worry about it being caught in battle?
This is… Kind of frustrating. The data is really interesting, though.
You in particular seem like you’re worth analysis, ~player~.
You’re not an AI, but I feel like you have some tricks up your sleeve the rest of us don’t.
Hm. Your second piece non-exposing piece, huh?
~player~, that was an interesting choice. But let’s see if we can’t get some more interesting data out of you yet!
You’ve been keeping this up pretty well!
I’m happy to see you taking a turn to lose, ~name~.
Really getting down to it, huh, ~player~?
Always a pleasure to watch you, ~player~! I'm honored you picked me.
Well, if that wasn’t the last piece...
Wow, you're really using all the tricks in the book, huh, ~player~?
This is it! Nothing left but the good stuff!
...Or just nothing. This was fun, ~player~!
Mettaton is such an offensive stereotype I don’t even know where to begin!
I’ll enjoy matching wits against you, Pit! If the commentary from the Bunker is to believed, I think others would like to see us match… Oh, uh, huh, you know, let’s just keep going.
Hm… You are fascinating, Pit!
Uh. If we could focus on the game and not sacrifices, I’d be a lot happier.
Yeah, yeah. Let’s keep going.
Not bad, ~name~. Don’t overthink it.
You’re falling behind, ~name~.
9S to Operator 21O to report status. ~name~: Two losses, 9S: 0.
A game like this is no fun if you don’t take it seriously, ~name~.
I’d probably save my visor for last. Though I don’t think your ~clothing~ is a real tactical advantage, ~name~.
Nothing left to lose now, ~name~. May as well fold.
Now that I can see all of you, I’m honestly amazed. You saved an accessory for last, but I haven’t lost at all yet. You’re weird, ~name~.
Flawless.
Doesn’t it seem weird with your twin here?
~name~’s enjoying herself. That’s nice, even though she lost so fast.
Wow, that looks like it elicited a great response. Can you do that again so Pod can track it?
Keep going, ~name~!
What are you going to take off, ~name~?
I’m interested to see what ~name~’s going to choose as her first play.
~name~’s first item. Pod, give me a character analysis based on norepinephrine and cortisol levels.
This isn’t your first loss, ~name~, but I don’t expect you diverge from pattern…
I’m not quite sure why this anticipation is so appealing, but I can’t wait to see what ~name~ takes off next!
Male YorHa models tend to either perform really well or really poorly. Not that ~name~’s playing badly but she’s over halfway done and I haven’t lost at all yet…
I wish 2B were here. She might be bored but she’d at least give me a challenge.
This is it!
~name~’s last item. I’m not thrilled I didn’t generate good data, but I’m still enjoying the rush of a clean win.
Huh. I can see the appeal.
Oh, I think I see why female anatomy is sometimes called a box. It’s like a blackbox, with all the fuzzy matter on the outside. I get it now!
I haven’t seen many female androids with the extra anatomy installed, but most look like that. It’s nice to see that the YorHa developers went for a timeless look.
That’s really interesting! Humans are so creative with even the smallest bits of their anatomy. Very attractive, ~name~!
Maybe Aimee’s biometrics were used somewhere along the line in the YorHa Project…
Oh. Okay. Way less confused and way more engaged now. Um. Too much information?
Hm. Futaba, you were right, this was a pretty uh… Enticing play.
Well, this is different, maybe-imaginary-fairy-girl.
Let’s not call it that.
You’re really downplaying your own appearance, Meia.
Hm. Normally, I’d be pretty frustrated, but let’s see if my model runs in reverse.
I’m… Confused by this choice, but I suppose you weren’t trying to start off with that many layers, or something. Is this just a bug?
YorHa works so hard to protect humanity’s legacy, ~name~. While you’re enticing, it’s… Somewhat hard for me to put aside my duty.
You look very nice, ~name~. You’re certainly giving me a rush of good hormones.
Well, for your countermeasures anyway. You don’t have to self-destruct until next round.
I honestly haven’t seen another person do this in… Uh, person.
I’ll record this so Pod can… I don’t know, do something with this. I’m sure the Operators would love a clip of this bizarreness.
I’m grateful that I don’t have to worry about DNA or fluids with other androids, especially if they look very similar...
I guess some hacks were required?
Is it fair to summon in… Uh, someone very similar to you?
Is it fair to summon in… Uh, someone very similar to you?
It seems profane....
I recognize a fellow Scanner, android or no, when I meet one. Don’t worry Twilight, I’ll observe and use your practices to make my own experience even better. Good luck!
Huh. I guess this’ll have to do for now.
Okay…
That’s a strong start, ~name~.
~name~’s got a hard opening. Pod, account for his shock and awe tactics!
Your ~clothing~ isn’t doing you any good, ~name~, maybe losing it’ll help you focus.
Current tactics are clearly working, judging by the size of that piece. I’m not going easy on you, ~name~!
~name~, you’re running out of options. You should probably focus if you want to take me on.
You’re out of your league, ~name~. Not to get overconfident, but I hope you’re holding out on us.
For something so big, I’m pretty surprised you saved that for last instead of protecting your anatomy…
You held onto something so big for so long, but despite losing, you showed off your weaknesses? That’s way too overconfident, ~name~.
I’m not used to operating without uh… Some insight.
Hm. I guess sufficiently advanced technology might resemble magic...
Say, you are human, aren’t you?
Well, I hope she finds it. A sharp intellect is pretty important for games of probability like this.
Stripes though! How interesting, and useful as optical camouflage.
You made the right choice not bringing your weapon, Corrin! After all, I left my sword at the Bunker!
Those gloves have a nervous interface… Huh. Are you a pilot too, D.Va?
The way you think matters a lot for persona based data, so I want to make sure it’s accurate.
I’m detecting .GIFany is over 90% corrupted by a logic virus. What do you mean I can’t terminate?
You in particular seem like you’re worth analysis, ~player~.
You’re not an AI, but I feel like you have some tricks up your sleeve the rest of us don’t.
Hm. Your second piece non-exposing piece, huh?
~player~, that was an interesting choice. But let’s see if we can’t get some more interesting data out of you yet!
You’ve been keeping this up pretty well!
I’m happy to see you taking a turn to lose, ~name~.
Really getting down to it, huh, ~player~?
Always a pleasure to watch you, ~player~! I'm honored you picked me.
Well, if that wasn’t the last piece...
Wow, you're really using all the tricks in the book, huh, ~player~?
This is it! Nothing left but the good stuff!
...Or just nothing. This was fun, ~player~!
Is she just some sort of shared hallucination?
What hurtful words? I’m sorry if I implied you don’t exist.
Creation, huh? How interesting.
Oh! I’m sorry! I’ll be a bit more clear… Next time.
I’m certainly grateful I get backed up at the Bunker, either way. It seems kinda… Deviant behavior.
She’s also kind of a stoic pain in the neck. But I wouldn’t have anyone else by my side.
This game sure digs up a lot of history.
But with Humanity on the moon, how much do we really need to worry about materials when we can scavenge from Earth…?
Is Neo actually human? Or some sort of simulated Machine Lifeform? I don’t want to deal with another Adam or Eve for a long time.
YorHa’s tried to develop morale-busting programs for the machines. Maybe you know something we don’t.
Are you so competitive you’re just trying to… Oh! I get it. You’re trying to distract everyone else.
I’ll have to do more research into this “Flame Tribe” of yours.
Hrm… Start compiling her personality profile. This is strange. Oh, uh, nothing to worry about Saki.
(Pod, check that response against her heart rate and alpha-pattern. She’s so interesting to study!)
Oh, they’re scan proof. That’s really dangerous technology, Sei, but very interesting!
Uh, no thanks. There’s certain materials that are incompatible with android physiology. Like mackerel, for instance.
I don’t think I’ve met many “-chan” designated models before.
O-oh. You aren’t an android at all. Um. Go ahead and uh, carry on with what you’re doing.
The model isn’t perfect, but it worked out pretty well until the end!
How do you run a Pod program with no external unit? To float like that?
You could probably integrate it into your suit. No?
Maybe… WCS and Quirks are two possible outcomes? This simulation sure posits some interesting theories… I guess that’s the goal of fiction, though.
What does it say about Videl’s power level… Hm. This might take a bit for it to boot and install… Anyway, not a terrible first play, Videl.
Huh. The results are inconclusive.
Whoa, did Vriska steal your powers, Marinette? Or just the costume? Or is this a common thing?
Huh. That probability manipulator copied Marinette's suit. Weirdly appropriate.
Huh. Did she steal your powers, Marinette? I mean, she's clearly doing better...
Huh. That probability manipulator copied Marinette's suit. Weirdly appropriate.
I guess the Old World called that type of particle manipulation magic. That'd make her a witch in this simulation, huh?
Which is magic of its own, I’ll have you know.
I wonder if you’d like a blue ribbon or a pink ribbon… Hm...
I’m only a little ahead of you now, ~name~. Let’s see what you’ve got!
I wonder if this is going to shape up your strategy moving forward. I’m going to guess no, though.
It’s hard to play against a Scanner type.
It has to be pretty hard to lose so many times without having gotten a single item off of someone, so it’s okay to try and save some dignity.
Oh, come on. You just took off your ~clothing~, and this late in the game. Pod, let me get started on my report. This is going nowhere.
Huh, I see. So when a male holds onto an item, it’s mostly because they were trying to get naked. But with females, it’s supposed to be for display.
To be honest, while you weren’t great competition, I’m enjoying looking at all of you. Uh, you know. Androids can appreciate this kind of too.
No no, your stripping is great! I mean my algorithm.
Those underwear look like something YorHa would make! But you seem so embarrassed. Why? Pod, why is he being aroused by being humiliated? That doesn’t make any sense.
You in particular seem like you’re worth analysis, ~player~.
Hm. Your second piece non-exposing piece, huh?
You’re not an AI, but I feel like you have some tricks up your sleeve the rest of us don’t.
You’ve been keeping this up pretty well!
~player~, that was an interesting choice. But let’s see if we can’t get some more interesting data out of you yet!
Really getting down to it, huh, ~player~?
I’m happy to see you taking a turn to lose, ~name~.
Well, if that wasn’t the last piece...
Always a pleasure to watch you, ~player~! I'm honored you picked me.
This is it! Nothing left but the good stuff!
Wow, you're really using all the tricks in the book, huh, ~player~?
...Or just nothing. This was fun, ~player~!
You’re keeping it interesting. I’d have guessed you’d start smaller.
This is going to be fun, ~name~!
That’s a substantial loss for an early game play.
You’re going to have to play better, ~name~. Keep going like this and it’ll be over for you and I won’t have even started yet...
At this point, I shouldn’t really be surprised. I’d just expected more a fight to get here.
I was hoping to improve my behavioral algorithms, but between my Pod and myself, it doesn’t look like I really need much fine tuning for human men, ~name~.
9S to Operator. 9S: No casualties. ~name~: 8. Consider this report sufficient countermeasures.
I’ll admit that I don’t get your strategy, ~name~, but I don’t want to waste a lot of time studying one that’s so clearly… bad.
Well, I mean, you seem to be without flaws, but my play was also pretty much error free.
This seems really strange, even for me.
Not bad!
I’d hate for androids to get a reputation for being weak.
That seemed comfortable, but like my coat, I suppose it’s ultimately designed to come off.
It’s impressive. Though… Aren’t the nipples supposed to be more a female thing?
But a big win for the rest of us.
Well, you kept most of yourself covered for most of the game. That’s admirable competition, I suppose.
Especially when you uncovered your penis so early.
For some reason I get a real mothering instinct from you, ~name~.
Oh, I can see it being… Uncomfortable to keep those under wraps for too long.
How do you fight with a pair like that? That’s a lot of weight to carry around.
Wow, even the Commander isn’t quite as… Embellished. I think.
I see, that does make a nice finish...
What’s this? I can’t scan ~name~? Hrm. Pod, reboot to more context sensitive data.
Oh, someone is certainly confident. I like the enthusiasm!
What bright red hair! Usually it’s far more muted, or synthetic looking, like with the Devola and Popola-class models. Very handsome, ~name~.
You seem to know something about Tactical Visors, ~name~, but none of you bothered to bring one. That seems like a bad choice to me.
A prince? Wait, really? A human that’s ordained to be above even other humans? That’s such a weird concept!
No need to be shy, ~name~. We’re all here to have fun. Well, fun is variable to people but…
A superhero?
